entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Rosthern
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -20.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saskatoon Diefenbaker Int'l Airport 10:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -20.8°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

Dewpoint: -25.4°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Blowing snow at times. Amount 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
